description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. This game is a twist on the traditional card game, Speed.  Are you fast enough to beat the computer or your friends?  Speed is an addictive fast paced card game so get your fingers ready!
